productInformation.name: Product Benefits
productInformation.value: This thirst-quenching formula provides moisture, softness, and protection for dry and color treated hair See more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HYDRATE TO THE MAX HYDRATE SHAMPOO Creamy, sulfate-free shampoo that deeply hydrates normal to thick dry, color-treated hair. HYDRATE CONDITIONER Creamy, luxurious conditioner that deeply softens and nourishes normal to thick dry, color-treated hair. HYDRATE SUPERFOOD TREATMENT Deeply nourishing treatment mask with essential nutrients that intensely moisturizes and softens hair. COLOR FANATIC Multitasking leave-in treatment with 21 benefits that primes hair for heat, detangles, protects from damage, and adds shine from root to tip.

Natural Ingredients + Aromatherapy Jojoba adds moisture, while Sage & Green Tea stimulate hair follicles & support a healthy scalp. Awake your senses with the invigorating scent of Menthol & Mint that leave a fresh, tingly feeling. Get The Best Results Apply a dime-sized amount of this super creamy formula to shampooed hair, focusing on the midlengths & ends where hair is most dry. Gently massage through hair. Wait 1-2 minutes. Rinse.

WHICH PUREOLOGY RANGE IS RIGHT FOR YOU? HYDRATE Add to Cart HYDRATE SHEER Add to Cart STRENGTH CURE Add to Cart STRENGTH CURE BLONDE Add to Cart SMOOTH PERFECTION Add to Cart PURE VOLUME Add to Cart NANOWORKS GOLD Add to Cart Customer Reviews 4.7 out of 5 stars 5,414 4.6 out of 5 stars 7,068 4.7 out of 5 stars 5,558 4.6 out of 5 stars 2,208 4.5 out of 5 stars 1,655 4.3 out of 5 stars 4,505 4.6 out of 5 stars 723 Price $74.00$74.00 $37.00$37.00 $37.00$37.00 $37.00$37.00 $37.00$37.00 $37.00$37.00 $50.00$50.00 HAIR TYPE Normal, dry color-treated Fine, dry color-treated Damaged, color-treated Blonde or highlighted Frizzy, color-treated Fine, color-treated Very dry, dull color-treated HAIR CONCERN Dryness, lack of moisture Dryness, lack of moisture Damage, split ends, breakage Brassy, yellow or orange tones Frizz, curl manageability Lack of volume, fullness, body Dryness, lack of shine BENEFITS Moisture and softness Moisture and softness Strength and softness Neutralizes brass Smoothness and frizz control Body and fullness Softness and shine KEY INGREDIENTS Jojoba, Green Tea, Sage Jojoba, Green Tea, Sage Keravis, Astaxanthin Keravis, Astaxanthin Camellia, Shea Butter Wheat Protein, Eucalyptus Leaf Keravis, Golden Marula Oil FRAGRANCE NOTES Lavender, Bergamot, Mint Lavender, Bergamot, Mint Raspberry, Peach, Water Flower Pear, Rose, Sandalwood Cocoa, Marshmallow Accord Pink Grapefruit, Wild Rose Dewy Pear, Ylang Ylang

Who is Hydrate for? Hydrate Shampoo and Conditioner are for medium to thick, dry, color-treated hair. It works for all texture types ranging from straight to coily. What is the difference between Hydrate & Hydrate Sheer? We recommend Hydrate Shampoo and Conditioner for thick to medium hair types since the formula is thicker and creamier. The formula of Hydrate Sheer is silicone-free and lightweight, so it is perfect for fine to medium hair types What is the main ingredient in Hydrate? The main ingredients in Hydrate Shampoo and Conditioner are Jojoba oil, Green Tea, and Sage. The jojoba oil moisturizes the hair, while the green tea helps promote a healthy scalp, and the sage stimulates hair follicles. Is Hydrate good for curly hair? Hydrate Shampoo and Conditioner has been tested on all hair textures and is an excellent choice for curly hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My hair looks GREAT!
reviews.reviewText: So happy with this product, it is vegan and that is very important to me. It is a wonderful, moisturizing conditioner that leaves your hair feeling so clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Due to overuse of ironing, my hair ends became dry. I had been using Moroccan products but found those weren't working. In fact, I started using Olaplex #3/6 to help with the issue and it wasn't making any difference. This product was recommended to me and after reading several reviews, I gave this a go and it's been great. Within 2 weeks, I've seen a big difference. Keep in mind, I also use the shampoo and the Olaplex products but what a difference. It lathers up beautifully. Smell great. My hair feels so soft and hydrated. A little goes a long way. I also notice that my hair isn't falling out as much...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pricey but wrks well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this conditioner. It makes my hair so soft and moisturized. I also like the smell!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effect on hair - amazing
reviews.reviewText: Since I made the switch to pureology I have been loving it. I use the shampoo & conditioner in combination with the hair mask and my hair is soft, shinny and smells amazing! I noticed I can go 3 days without washing and a little goes a long way with this product also! My hair doesn’t look oily and feel strains after like most products. The price is worth it! I still have more than half the bottle left and I bought this a few months ago! The 21 benefits spray is amazing also! I love that I made the switch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strong Scent but Works
reviews.reviewText: This stuff works so very well on my dry hair. Just beware it is very strong smelling such as eucalyptus, mint or something else?? 🤷🏼‍♀️ But again, it is really one of the best conditioners I’ve ever used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Why does it work so well?!
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo and conditioner is the ONLY thing that has ever stopped my dandruff. Not just made it less, I mean completely eliminates it within 1 or 2 washes. I was actually recommended it by a dermatologist about a decade ago. I wish this could be a medical subscription because it truly is life changing but damn is it expensive. Also, it feels amazingly cooling on my scalp even after I wash it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner leaves my hair silky soft. I noticed results after the first use. It seems to offset the effects of humidity too.

There’s a cooling effect with use. I love This conditioner. My hair feels glorious! Shiny, healthy, great on streaked colour treated hair. Highly recommended. The smell is subtle but lovely and that little extra cooling kick is awesome!
Love this, wish it was cheaper.. but i just love the smell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: So far it's the best conditioner I have tried
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry and brittle hair. This product makes it a bit softer and easier to brush.The smell is strong (mint) , it's tingling my scalp ... but it's not an issue for me.

I have bleached, damaged hair and this shampoo and conditioner are the absolute best. Ive tried redken and biolage and they don’t match up. My hair is so clean and soft.The most impressive part is this conditioner makes my hair even softer than the Morrocanoil hair mask. The first day it’s hard to tell but after 2-3 days, with this conditioner, my hair is STILL soft. That never happen with any hair mask.
